mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT(email, password, account_type) VALUES(#{email}, #{password}, #{account_type})
INSERT INTO USER(email, phone, user_name) VALUES(#{email}, #{phone}, #{user_name})

INSERT INTO STORE(email, store_name, company_id, address_line, telephone, operating_time, description, store_representing_image_res) VALUES(#{email}, #{store_name}, #{company_id}, #{address_line}, #{telephone}, #{operating_time}, #{description}, #{store_representing_image_res})
